website_summaries.verdict: The Nikon Coolpix P950 is an appealing camera for wildlife specialists, but most won't need its exceptional zoom power.
cons: Autofocus struggles with small and fast-moving subjects

customer_reviews.title: Great Zoom
customer_reviews.text: I bought thiss camera as I wanted a superzoom - I have a Nikon Z6 but there wasn't any lens available that got close to the zoom range of this plus even the longest zooms were incrrediibly heavy. So this is basically my wildlife camera. For that it does a good job, on a tripod its very good. Bit tricky to hold steady at maximum zoom but not impossible just need to make sure your stance is.stable . I've been able to take some great pictures of small birds that I could hardly see with the naked eye. So overall I'm glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: A camera can almost capture everything
customer_reviews.text: It’s a fun camera. Not for pro photographer, but prefect for birds watching and moon shooting. Imagine quality is very good between the zoom 24-800. Macro is also impressive. With this camera you can see and capture the stuff usually you can’t with any other cameras or lens. At this point it’s very worth of money. I own a few other cameras, most of them are very expensive ones, but this camera brings me a lot of joy. And it’s not heavy at all. You can carry it with you all the time ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for general photos but has it's limitations
customer_reviews.text: Bought the P950 with the intention of upgrading from my old Panasonic FZ100 Bridge camera and was initially seduced by the optical zoom equivalent to 2000 mm. I found that the zoom worked well up to 1000 mm with good image stabilisation. The image quality dropped noticeably from 1000 mm upwards and the 16 megapixel sensor did not help + the exposure compensation control was limited. The LCD monitor and electronic viewfinder and macro photos taken on short zoom were good. I decided to try a light weight Nikon DSLR combined with a compact 18-300 zoom lens instead and still use my old FZ100 as a backup
customer_reviews.author: MaxBit Rate

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional  camera for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera after having an accident and smashing my Nikon D50 to pieces. I was suprised with what the camera offered especially the 84x zoom, the quality of the photos was great, hides my shakes when taking photos at full zoom. And the extras are really great. If you are not sure about exposure and time, then the auto is great. I have to admit this is well worth the price. Thank you Nikon.
customer_reviews.author: Viv Clatworthy

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant one lenses wide to 83x optical telephoto camera
customer_reviews.text: I want it for birding? Flowers and the moon (maybe some astrophotography). So far five stars. All these photos were hand held. Very satisfying.
customer_reviews.author: J. Friedmann

customer_reviews.title: Light has to be very good to get clear pictures like this.
customer_reviews.text: Light has to be very good or the picture quality is very poor! Can’t get horizon straight even on a tripod with bubble centralized! Use it for panoramic and bird /wildlife shots. Digital zoom is not worth using. Disappointed after spending over £700.
customer_reviews.author: Billy S.

customer_reviews.title: Improved  handling compared with P900
customer_reviews.text: The view finder on the P950 is far better than on the P900. It is lighter and easier to use than a SLR with a separate lens of equal magnification.
customer_reviews.author: G. Thomson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera, excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera, the quality of the pictures is amazing. The photo attached was taken a few days after getting the camera so was still getting used to it. The Bluetooth is also a bonus making it easier to save/upload photos. The customer service was also excellent, had a minor issue and they kept in contact with me and it was resolved within 24 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Miss AF Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: This Camera is incredible I have always wanted to be able to take photo's of the moon but never anything like I was able to do with this Camera It's amazing to use The photo's I have posted Shows the detail ofthe zoom thanks to the wind turbine from where I was Stood to Where I zoomed in your able to See the writing and I'm a good Mile away from it. just incredible. It is a little weighty but nothing Unbearable Im an amature Photographer and I love this Camera Which is going to be able to take Me to the next Step In My photos Just wow!
customer_reviews.author: Manda

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bridge camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is a pretty amazing step up from your basic compact. The image quality is great, and there are several modes to try. Essentially this is no good for a pro has the lens is not switchable, it is aimed at the more ambitious consumer. My son had taken really excellent pictures of birds and the moon, which I'll try to post, but the magnification is extraordinary. Ideal for someone who want powerful magnification and to take good automatic photos, but doesn't want the freedom to change lenses. Basically it is a very powerfull all in one that is especially good at long ranged photos of wildlife and the moon.
customer_reviews.author: A. I. Mackenzie

product_meta.title: Nikon COOLPIX P950
feature_bullets: Super Zoom: 83x Optical Zoom and focal-length range of 24-2000mm. Get even closer with 166x Dynamic Fine Zoom & 332x Digi Zoom
Create Amazing Videos: with the 4K ultra HD and HDMI feature, stereo sound & accessory hot-shoe to amplify your needs
Easy Editing and Post-Processing with RAW Images

Flexible Control for your needs: High-resolution electronic viewfinder, manual controls or easy auto shooting. Side buttons allow you to easily adjust your focus on your photographic target. Vari-Angle TFT LCD Screen for flexible shooting

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars41 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
